item.title: ‘Lean Diabetes’ a Risk Factor for Dementia?
item.description: Clinicians may be overlooking ‘lean diabetes’ as a risk factor for dementia. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Second Anti-HER2 TKI Approved for NSCLC
item.description: Bayer’s sevabertinib picks up a second-line indication for HER2-mutated disease, joining Boehringer’s zongertinib on the US market. Medscape Medical N...

item.title: Checkpoint Inhibitor Prices Dropped Marginally Over Decade
item.description: A recent analysis reveals that monthly prices of checkpoint inhibitors decreased only a small amount over a decade. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Allergy Therapy Shortcut? Omalizumab Speeds OIT Start
item.description: Children who received omalizumab pretreatment underwent less dose escalation in oral immunotherapy. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Despite Risks, Safety Warnings, Valproate Use On the Rise
item.description: Even as newer antiseizure drugs surge, global prescribing remains anchored to valproate, signaling slow adoption of safety recommendations. Medscape M...
